snippet: A lender, Salus Capital Partners, claimed that the struggling electronics retailer breached covenants on a $250 million loan, RadioShack said.
abstract: Trading in shares of RadioShack is halted after company discloses dispute with lender Salus Capital Partners; Salus claims that struggling retailer breached covenants of $250 million loan; shares plunge as much as 20 percent after trading is resumed.
lead_paragraph: A lender, Salus Capital Partners, claimed that the struggling electronics retailer breached covenants on a $250 million loan, RadioShack said.

headline.main: RadioShack Trading Is Halted After News of Dispute Emerges
headline.print_headline: Radioshack Trading Is Halted After News of Dispute Emerges
